summary: Daily routine tracking app with AI assistant integration
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist illustration of a morning routine checklist with warm earth tones (routine-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
- Simple AI assistant avatar icon with friendly appearance (assistant-avatar.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement frontend UI to display a list of daily routines showing name, scheduled time, and completion status with the ability to mark routines as complete
Create a form interface to add new routines with fields for routine name, description, and scheduled time
Implement an AI assistant chat interface where users can interact with an assistant to get help managing their routines
Add ability to edit existing routines including name, description, and scheduled time
Implement a dashboard view showing daily progress statistics such as completion rate and streak tracking
Create a modern, cohesive visual design with a calm and productive aesthetic using warm earth tones and clean typography that promotes focus and routine building

new_feature_requests.summary: Smart AI assistant integration to help with routine management
Create a backend data model to store daily routines with fields for routine name, description, scheduled time, completion status, and timestamp
Create backend logic for the AI assistant to provide intelligent suggestions and reminders about daily routines based on user's routine data
